treasure: NPC gear (studded leather armor, short sword, light crossbow with 20 bolts)
description: This lanky man sneers as he draws his sword. Tiny horns and a barbed tail reveal that he is something more than human.

sections.body: Tiefling sorcerers with the Abyssal or Infernal bloodline treat their Charisma score as 2 points higher for all sorcerer class abilities.
sections.name: Fiendish Sorcery

sections.body: Tieflings are humans with demonic, devilish, or other evil outsider blood in their ancestry. Often persecuted for their strange appearance and unnatural mannerisms, most tieflings disguise their nature or are forced to live on the fringes or underbelly of civilized society. Though they are not born evil, it is an easy path for them to find, especially as most suffer at the hands of “normal” folks while growing up. Tieflings look mostly human except for some physical traits that reveal their strange heritage.
Tieflings are defined by their class levels—they do not possess racial HD. They have the following racial traits.
sections.name: Tiefling

sections.body: Tieflings are quick in body and mind, but are inherently strange.
sections.name: +2 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence, -2 Charisma

sections.body: Tieflings see in the dark up to 60 feet.
sections.name: Darkvision

sections.body: Tieflings have a +2 racial bonus on Bluff and Stealth checks.
sections.name: Skilled

sections.body: Tieflings can use darkness once per day as a spell-like ability. The caster level for this ability equals the tiefling's class level.
sections.name: Spell-Like Ability

sections.body: Tieflings have cold resistance 5, electricity resistance 5, and fire resistance 5.
sections.name: Fiendish Resistance

sections.body: Tieflings begin play speaking Common and either Abyssal or Infernal. Tieflings with high Intelligence scores can choose any of the following: Abyssal, Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Gnome, Goblin, Halfling, Infernal, and Orc.
sections.name: Languages

name: Tiefling
skills: Acrobatics +6, Bluff +4, Disable Device +6, Escape Artist +6, Intimidate +2, Perception +5, Sense Motive +5, Sleight of Hand +6, Stealth +8
